title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 54.3 - Transporting vessels within the Port of New York
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 54.3 - Transporting vessels within the Port of New York

State Regulations

Sandy Hook pilots, when requested to do so, are required to
transport American vessels under register and foreign vessels within the Port
of New York. Hudson River pilots may not transport within the Port of New York
unless ice conditions preclude the boarding of vessels at the board-designated
station for Hudson River pilots. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
54.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
